channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: Typhoon Lee
item.description: Typhoon Lee (Chinese: 李太楓; pinyin: Lǐ Tàifēng; born 1948) is a Taiwanese astrophysicist and geochemist at Academia Sinica, Taiwan, where he specializes in isotope geochemistry and nuclear astrophysics.
